text.autoconfig.moisturization.title: Moisturization Options
text.autoconfig.moisturization.option.gr: Growth is randomly cancelled all but 1/[X] times
text.autoconfig.moisturization.option.bo: Growth is randomly cancelled all but 1/[X] times (0 for no bone meal growth at all)
text.autoconfig.moisturization.option.fa: The percentage of the speed at which farmland dries out
text.autoconfig.moisturization.option.sp:
How long (in seconds) sprinklers will run once powered;
Set to 0 to make them only run while powered
Sprinklers affect things within this range
text.autoconfig.moisturization.option.ne: Netherite Sprinklers affect things within this range
text.autoconfig.moisturization.option.le: Leaking pipes water farmland within this range
text.autoconfig.moisturization.option.sp: Sprinklers need to be connected to a water-filled pipe in order to work
